com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform

Class ClassifiedPeerSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.ClassifiedPeerSelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPeerSelector

    public class ClassifiedPeerSelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPeerSelector
    Enables the specification of one or more peers by their classification.
    Author:
    dawood

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClassifiedPeerSelector

        public ClassifiedPeerSelector(boolean exactMatch,
                      java.lang.String classification)

      • ClassifiedPeerSelector

        public ClassifiedPeerSelector(boolean exactMatch,
                      HierarchicalName classification)
        Create the selector to match using the given hierarchical classification.
        Parameters:
        exactMatch - if true, then the given classification will be tested for an exact match with candidate peers. if false, then the given classification is treated as a prefix.
        classification - hierarchical classification specification that must be matched by peers for them to be returned in getPeers(IApplicationDescriptor, ITopologyMonitor).

    • Method Detail

      • getPeers

        public java.util.Collection<IApplicationDescriptor> getPeers(IApplicationDescriptor app,
                                                    ITopologyMonitor topoMonitor)
        Description copied from interface: IPeerSelector
        Get the requested applications according to the implementation.
        Specified by:
        getPeers in interface IPeerSelector
        Parameters:
        app - the application for which the peers are being sought.
        topoMonitor - provides information about topology of peers.
        Returns:
        never null. All returned IApplicationDescriptors must be peers of the one given, and the given app must not be contained in the returned collection.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
